programme.title: CYC TV
programme.desc: Christian Youth Channel - CYC aka Coptic Youth Channel, is a television and internet based English Coptic Orthodox Channel. CYC is the first English Coptic Christian channel, dedicated to Christians all around the world to spread the teachings and love of Jesus Christ. CYC looks to spread the word and life of Christ all through the world in a way that is compatible with today’s media consumption methods.

programme.title: CTV
programme.desc: CTV is the official channel of the Coptic Orthodox Church, run under the care and blessings of our Supreme Pontiff, His Holiness Pope Shenouda III, Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the See of St. Mark, may the Lord prolong his life for many years and healthy, safe eras.The channel presents all manner of art and television programs which reflect the original proper Orthodox faith and the Church's message, founded on love and peace within a framework of professional international media, which occasioned its enormous success. قناة سي تي في هي القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية، تحت رعاية قداسة البابا المعظم الأنبا تواضروس الثاني، بابا الإسكندرية وبطريرك الكرازة المرقسية، أدام الله رئاسته لنا سنينًا عديدة وأزمنة سلامية هادئة مديدة. وتقوم القناة بتقديم كافة أنواع الفنون والبرامج التليفزيونية التي تعكس أصالة وجوهر وسلامة العقيدة الأرثوذكسية ورسالة الكنيسة القائمة على المحبة والسلام في إطار من الحرفية الإعلامية.

programme.title: MESat TV
programme.desc: ME Sat TV, is a Christian Orthodox channel; aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة مى سات، القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية تنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.title: Logos TV
programme.desc: Logos TV is a Christian Orthodox channel; its message is testimony to our good Lord Jesus Christ according to our Orthodox faith. The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

programme.title: El Maqar TV
programme.desc: El Maqar TV - A Coptic TV Channel under the see of H.H. Pope Tawadros II and his partner in the service H.G. Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Arabic hits that simply strike the right note for a fulfilling musical experience. أشهر الأغاني العربية المصورة التي تناسب جميع الأذواق وتلعب على أوتار القلب فتارة يذوب حناناً ورقة، وطوراً تتسارع دقاته مع الإيقاع فيفيض حيوية وبهجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Free TV is the Number One Music channel in Lebanon. In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة فري تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.

programme.desc: Head beneath the waves of Singapore's coast and islands to discover some of its aquatic animals, including the rare tiger tail seahorse, the powerful pistol shrimp and the dog-faced water snake.

programme.title: Wild Singapore
programme.desc: An exploration of Singapore's forests, which are home to some of the least known primates in the world, flying dragons, mating snakes, and many more.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The ultimate portrait of our planet looks at the key factors that shape our natural history. In the Arctic spring, a mother polar bear and cubs have two weeks to cross the frozen sea. Time-lapse cameras capture the transformation created by floods.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A tour of the mountain ranges reveals how animals rise to the challenge of mountain life. The snow leopard finds habitat in the largest glaciers of the world.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Follow the descent of rivers from their mountain sources to the sea. Witness unique and dramatic moments of animal behaviour, including a piranha frenzy and a showdown between otters and crocodiles.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Although often overlooked, caves are remarkable habitats with equally bizarre wildlife. This documentary provides a unique access to a hidden world of stalactites, stalagmites, snotites and troglodytes that brings a wealth of surprises.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Deserts cover one fifth of the planet and they are spreading every year. We think we are familiar with the Sahara and the Kalahari but what about the Gobi or the Atacama -so many deserts have hardly been explored.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The Arctic and Antarctic experience the most extreme seasons on Earth. Time-lapse cameras watch a colony of penguins, while aerial images show a polar bear swimming more than 100 km.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: After filming for three years, the shy Mongolian gazelle and the bizarre-looking Tibetan fox are captured on film. Over six weeks, the team follows a pride of 30 lions as they attempt to hunt elephants.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Jungles cover roughly three per cent of our planet yet contain 50 per cent of the world's species. In the Ngogo forest, the largest chimpanzee group defends its territory from neighbouring groups. Other specialists include a parasitic fungi.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A humpback whale mother and calf embark on a journey from tropical coral paradises to storm-ravaged polar seas. Indonesian coral reefs reveal seahorses, clams and sea kraits. Bull fur seals attack king penguins, and sea urchins fell forests of kelp.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: From the evergreen forests of the frozen north to the deciduous dry forests of the Equator, discover the greatest woodlands on Earth.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: In the ocean, life goes to extraordinary lengths to survive this immense realm. A 30-tonne whale shark gorges on a school of fish. Deep sea octopus fly in the abyss and vampire squid use bioluminescence to create a colour display.

programme.title: Earth's Great Seasons
programme.desc: Celebrate spring on planet Earth, and learn about the extraordinary tricks that animals and plants find to rise to the new challenges it brings.

programme.title: North Woods Law

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: In New Hampshire, Officer Glen Lucas investigates a dispute between a turkey hunter and an eyewitness. Sergeant Todd Szewczyk hunts down a trespassing target shooter and Officers McKee and Matson fish for the truth from trespassing ATV riders.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: Officer Lopashanski makes a surprising discovery while searching an island for an injured bald eagle. Officers Cheney and Pushee stumble upon a trespasser whose vehicle is stuck in a mud hole.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: McKee and Pushee confront two hunters lying about illegally baiting deer, Officer Arsenault deals with a tight-lipped teenage fisherman who refuses to provide any information and Lt. Boudreau stumbles upon a couple in a compromising position.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: Officer Jim Cyrs and Lt. Saunders rush to the scene of an ATV accident. Officer James Benvenuti works with K-9 Cora to track down a suspect. Officer Eric Hannett gets backup from Lieutenant Bill Boudreau when dealing with a suspicious fisherman.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Holmes and trainee Frye respond to an ATV accident in which a man's head has been run over. Officer McKee helps relocate a rare rattlesnake. Officer Courtney assists a dog locked inside a car. On Mt. Willard, a collapsed student needs rescuing.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Protect and Preserve
programme.desc: Officer Chris McKee attempts to remove a bear from a tree in a playground, while Officer Fluette picks out his new K9 partner. Officer Lucas searches for a group of ATVs. On the snowy summit of Mt. Washington, officers search for lost hikers.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer James Benvenuti chases down two lobster poachers in Rye. In a puzzling case, Officer Graham Courtney investigates a man on the beach found covered in blood. And Sergeant Adam Cheney attempts to apprehend trespassers on the railroad tracks.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: At the state's largest ice fishing derby, Officer Canfield looks for the owner of a frozen fishing line while Major Juneau takes command of a mountain rescue. Officer McKee runs radar for snowmobiles. And Officer Cyrs checks on a moose in a bog.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The dive team assists at an event in Hampton Beach, while Officer Courtney patrols the area's clam flats. Officers Hannett and Holmes patrol snowmobile activity across the state. And Officer Demler helps a bobcat that's been injured by a porcupine.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: With the help of local police, Lt. Boudreau and Officer Hannett remove campers found illegally occupying state property. An 8-year-old boy is found riding solo on an ATV, and Officer Crouse helps two raccoon cubs found on the road.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Bronson questions a hunter who shot a deer without the proper permit, while Officer Demler runs radar on a popular snowmobile trail. Sgt. Lucas investigates a suspicious deer kill site. And Officer Cyrs responds to a snowmobile accident.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A horrific rock climbing accident on Cannon Cliffs sends two officers and an emergency team on a heroic helicopter rescue mission. A combative man is found illegally ridding an OHRV and is questioned by Officer Crouse, and a moose causes a traffic jam.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A team is deployed to relocate a moose that has found its way into the city. During an undercover mission, Officer Egan encounters multiple violating bird hunters, while Officer Canfield rushes to rescue an injured hiker trapped on Mount Carrigain.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Lt. Boudreau and Officer Hannett have an unusually busy day on ATV patrol. Officer McDermott investigates a man who illegally shot a rabbit in a residential area. Officers Holmes and Cyrs use ATVs to rescue an injured hiker on Mount Carter.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Newly promoted Sgt. Lucas shows Trainee Frye the ropes during a busy ATV weekend. Hannett attempts to rescue an injured heron and later faces off with a moose. And lost hikers turn to Holmes for help as the sun goes down and temperatures drop.

programme.desc: A reporter pretends to be the girlfriend of the son of a famous politician to help him save face over Christmas. She becomes torn between exposing newsworthy scoops about the famous family and trusting that she's falling in love for real.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: Single mom Maggie is facing Christmas alone until Lucas crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest. Together they overcome Christmas while finding comfort in their growing bond.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: A historian is hired to create a Christmas display at the Plaza. While working, she learns that fate has prevailed and teamed her up with a handsome decorator to help bring the display, and their romance, to life.

programme.title: Small Town Christmas
programme.desc: A bestselling Christmas author reconnects with the man who inspired her novel and stood her up on a date in New York.

programme.title: Holiday for Heroes
programme.desc: Worlds suddenly collide for a woman and a soldier who have been exchanging letters for a year finally meet.

programme.title: Cranberry Christmas
programme.desc: A separated couple fakes marital bliss on national television to help their town's Christmas festival, and their business.

programme.title: A Christmas for the Books
programme.desc: A lifestyle guru is forced to prove she is a romance expert during an interview for her dream job.

programme.title: A Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: A woman has her cover-story stolen, so, she searches for a new story to write about, a Christmas miracle. With the help of her son, and a handsome photographer, she finds the true miracle of the holidays, love.

programme.title: Sound of Christmas
programme.desc: During the Christmas season a high school music teacher is hired by a handsome widower to give music lessons to his teenage daughters. Their lives are turned around for the better as the family grows closer and learns the importance of love.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: A struggling father has no idea how to cope with his six-year-old twins. He sets out to find a nanny and ends up with Mrs. Merkle, or Mrs. Miracle, as the children have dubbed her. Mrs. Miracle enters their lives and changes everything for the family.

programme.title: A Gingerbread Romance
programme.desc: An architect and her team enter a contest to build a life-size gingerbread house. When her baker falls through, she is forced to outsource to a local bakery and instantly falls for the baker, a single dad, and they spend the holidays together.

programme.title: Holly and Ivy
programme.desc: After her neighbour's illness returns, a woman looks for someone to renovate her house so she can adopt her children.

programme.title: Moonlight and Mistletoe
programme.desc: A woman must return to her hometown of Santaville to help her father.

programme.title: A Bramble House Christmas
programme.desc: A man goes undercover to discover the truth about his father's final days.

programme.title: Last Vermont Christmas
programme.desc: The Marvin sisters always spend Christmas in their family home. This is coming to an end as their parents have decided to sell the house to sister Megan's high-school boyfriend. Spending time together, Megan realizes she may be falling in love.

programme.title: The Perfect Christmas Present
programme.desc: Tom decides to help his old college friend find the perfect gift for his girlfriend. However Tom gets too close and she ends up falling in love with him.

programme.title: Christmas Tree Lane
programme.desc: A woman spearheads her community efforts to save her street from demolition. While on her mission, she falls for a man and uncovers that he is actually working for the company she is fighting.

programme.title: The Magical Christmas Ornaments
programme.desc: Marie finds her Christmas spirit reawakened when her mother begins sending her the family's Christmas ornaments.

programme.title: A Family Christmas Gift
programme.desc: A woman spends the holidays with her aunt to help plan a Christmas concert. While there, she finds herself drawing closer to her aunt, and, to the new love in her life.

programme.title: A Heavenly Christmas
programme.desc: Upon her untimely death, a workaholic finds herself in training to be a Christmas Angel. Despite being the worst recruit in the history of Christmas, she is assigned a hard luck case and forced to solve man's problems.

programme.title: Christmas Incorporated
programme.desc: Riley miraculously lands an assistant position with a headstrong, wealthy entrepreneur. He is being forced to play Scrooge and close one of his factories weeks before Christmas. Riley convinces him to visit the town, and hatches a plan.

programme.title: A Princess for Christmas
programme.desc: A young woman takes her niece and nephew to the English countryside to visit their grandfather, a royal duke, for Christmas. While there, she unwittingly falls for a dashing prince.

programme.title: A Joyous Christmas
programme.desc: A successful motivational speaker learns the true meaning of Christmas when she is rescued from a near fatal accident by a stranger.

programme.desc: Sarah Davis finds love in an unusual entitled Hollywood star, who visits her family ranch to prepare for a film.

programme.title: A Boyfriend for Christmas

programme.title: Romance at Reindeer Lodge
programme.desc: A group of adults from different parts of the country swear off partaking in holiday events.

programme.title: Dirt Every Day
programme.desc: To celebrate forgetting their 100th episode, Fred and Dave are in Indonesia, an island nation between Australia and Asia. Their goal is to build a truck that isn't available in the US, and they set their sights on a Daihatsu Taft.

programme.title: Dirt Every Day
programme.desc: Fred and Dave have been daydreaming of improving on a Humvee they built years ago. They're back in the shop to build a more nimble machine, then out to the desert to see if their truck can keep up with a top-of-the-line UTV.

programme.title: Junkyard Gold
programme.desc: Steve explores how Chrysler's A-body Dusters and Darts appealed to buyers looking for the smallest platform with the biggest engine, while midsize B-bodies like the Charger and Coronet were for those seeking more interior space.

programme.title: Junkyard Gold
programme.desc: Steve visits Cadillac King and uncovers a massive '68 Fleetwood and a '75 Calais six-door limo. He'll also try to bust the notion that all Caddys are gigantic with a '79 Seville Milan roadster and a '93 Allante.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: David Freiburger's 1967 Chevy, the Crusher Camaro, is one of the industry's best-known project cars. This changeling is getting its latest makeover on Roadkill Garage, and the retro revival wraps up with a trip to the drag strip.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The team's skills are tested when they get a 1933 Ford Tudor that needs a precise paint match as well as key interior and exterior upgrades.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: David and Steve had a blast getting an old Dodge 360 running and driving in a gutted old truck. Now they want to jerk that engine and transplant it into a '70 Challenger that has been off the road since at least 1989.

programme.title: Overhaulin'

programme.desc: The owner of a 2003 GMC Yukon wants to add a lot of horses to this grocery getter. The guys take over the project and install a turbo and fuel lines, then add rear-end components to help keep that newly-added power on the pavement.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: After more than 50,000 man hours and 5,000 parts, the Futurliner is ready for its debut. A Bel-Air gets a new top and Dave looks back at the build of a VW bus.

programme.title: Scorpion

programme.desc: When strange towers of ice are found growing from in a barren, water-starved desert, experts speculate why these structures have uncanny similarities to extraterrestrial formations recently discovered on Pluto's alien landscape.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: Experts make a chilling new discovery when they unearth a 30,000-year-old zombie virus from an icy grave. If this ancient disease is successfully resuscitated back to life, it could cause a catastrophic global calamity.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: A satellite image over New York reveals a forgotten island covered with large, crumbling buildings and swallowed by trees; investigators discover a story of fatal disease and unending misery buried beneath the ruins of this apocalyptic terrain.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: The myth of Merlin is associated with an arrangement of stones in northern France, and satellite images might finally explain this ancient riddle. Investigators uncover something mysterious buried beneath the Gulf of Mexico. An island suddenly appears.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: When satellites discover a strange abandoned city frozen in time, experts investigate what caused the people who lived here to disappear overnight. Using cutting-edge tech, they follow fresh leads to uncover if this mysterious city has a dark secret.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: An ancient man-made volcano might reveal buried treasure and bloody human sacrifice. When NASA discovers a strange pattern in the Arctic ice, experts investigate if it has alien origins. A mystery in the Sahara might have a sinister explanation.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob Nelson heads to California to investigate a network for major fault lines that could set off an unprecedented mega-quake. Then, he explores a mysterious sinkhole that some believe is an endless pit to the center of the Earth.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob Nelson investigates rumors of a secret underground escape route used by the infamous gangster Al Capone. Washington State, Rob tries to uncover who or what built a vast landscape of earthen mounds in Washington State.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: A legendary train filled with stolen Nazi gold is said to be hidden in Poland. Using cutting-edge technology, Rob Nelson and Stefan Burns explore deep underneath the earth's surface and in abandoned Nazi tunnels in search for the infamous legend.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Priceless gold and silver artifacts are believed to be in the fabled lost Temple Treasures of Jerusalem and King Solomon's hidden mines. With unprecedented access, Rob Nelson and Stefan Burns use the latest technology to search for the legendary treasure.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: At an ancient city lost in the desert for 5,000 years, experts uncover evidence of human sacrifice and strange rituals, and new discoveries reveal that the people who lived here might have been the first civilization of the Americas.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: New discoveries reveal dark secrets of the event that destroyed Pompeii.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: New evidence could help solve some of the Great Pyramid's greatest mysteries. Follow the investigation into how it was built, revealing the truth behind its hidden tombs and deepest secrets.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: Recent forensic findings uncover the astonishing secrets of the world's most iconic monument, the great Sphinx at Giza. Join the extraordinary investigation as it reveals which pharaoh commissioned this colossal statue and why it was never finished.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: Egypt's Black Pyramid is the strange, crumbling pyramid that collapsed before its pharaoh was ever buried here, and today, it's largely unexplored. Special access to a hi-tech archaeological investigation reveals what went so catastrophically wrong.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: New discoveries explore the dark secrets of Tutankhamun's tomb. Archaeologists are finally finding answers to its ancient riddles, showing how his untimely death, his calamitous burial, and an act of God made a minor king the most famous of them all.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: Pyramids in the deserts of Sudan are the ruins of a powerful lost civilization that rivaled the pharaohs of ancient Egypt, and using cutting-edge tech and archaeological methods, experts are revealing the secrets behind the mysterious Kingdom of Kush.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: A mysterious city in ancient Egypt is the home of the Valley of the Kings and grand temples, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and if the god the pharaohs worshiped here helped them rise to power.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: The Egyptian mega-temple at Karnak was once the political powerbase of the ancient pharaohs and the home to strange religious rituals. New discoveries of skeletons tell a story of jealousy, betrayal, and the rise of a new religion that changed Egypt.
